lg.l: All she said you and me
All she said it meant to be
All she gave me reason to believe
When she said she would never leave
Where are you now?
What are you doing to me?
Where are you now?
All she said hold me tight
When we stayed up all night
All she said trust in me
All I have is what she said to me…
Where are you now?
What are you doing to me?
Where are you now?
The wind you feel I feel it too
The sky you see is not just for you
We are on the same road don’t turn your head away
Maybe some day…
Where are you now?
What are you doing to me?
Where are you now?
Oh she said you and me
